issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
An error occurred when YARN Federation used Mysql as state store. The reason I found it was because the field used to create the applicationsHomeSubCluster table was 'subClusterId' and the stored procedure used 'homeSubCluster'. I fixed this problem.

 

submitApplication appIdapplication_1516277664083_0014 try #0 on SubCluster cluster1 , queue: root.bdp_federation
 [2018-01-18T23:25:29.325+08:00] [ERROR] store.impl.SQLFederationStateStore.logAndThrowRetriableException(FederationStateStoreUtils.java 158) [IPC Server handler 44 on 8050] : Unable to insert the newly generated application application_1516277664083_0014
 com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'homeSubCluster' in 'field list'

fields.summary: YARN Federation used Mysql as state store throw exception, Unknown column 'homeSubCluster' in 'field list'

comments.body:
GitHub user Yiran-wu opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/331

    YARN-7773. Fix YARN Federation used Mysql as state store throw except…

    YARN-7773 YARN Federation used Mysql as state store throw exception, Unknown column 'homeSubCluster' in 'field list'
    
    
    #YARN-7773

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/Yiran-wu/hadoop trunk

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/331.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #331
    
----
commit 86dbe80c943da0164877bb1e76416dc1dfb59111
Author: yiran <yiranpinkroom@...>
Date:   2018-01-18T16:24:08Z

    YARN-7773. Fix YARN Federation used Mysql as state store throw exception, Unknown column homeSubCluster in field list

----
Good job! Very helpful to me!!! Thanks

Github user Yiran-wu closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/331
I found problem in the branch-3.1. good to backport to this branch.
Given branch-2 and branch-3.0 also affected, why not this back ported to those branches as well?
I havnt analyzed other branches yet. Currently have pushed to branch-3.0 too.
